member.name: T:EMT.ModEditor.AssetBasePostprocessor
member.summary: Postprocessor to automatically set the correct asset bundle for all AssetBase inside a mod folder. Uses the asset path name to determine the asset bundle, ie Assets/_mods/MyMod/MyAsset will end up in assetbundle mymod

member.name: M:EMT.ModEditor.AssetBasePostprocessor.GetDesiredAssetBundleName(System.String)
member.summary: null when no desired asset bundle name.

member.name: T:EMT.ModEditor.ModToolControlPanelWindow.ModPage
member.summary: state of a single mod "edit" page or whatever you wanna call it

member.name: F:EMT.ModEditor.ModToolControlPanelWindow.SteamVdfInfo.PublishedFileId
member.summary: 0 for non-existent id (= new workshop item).
